body_text: XPCOMUtils.defineLazyPreferenceGetter will take care of all of this, but if you use formatURLPref this problem goes away anyway.
body: `XPCOMUtils.defineLazyPreferenceGetter` will take care of all of this, but if you use formatURLPref this problem goes away anyway.
body_html: XPCOMUtils.defineLazyPreferenceGetter will take care of all of this, but if you use formatURLPref this problem goes away anyway.
